about_the_game:
Follow the story of a former soldier named Erastes, searching the world, chasing the shadow of a man who has done him irreparable harm: Esfal.

Journey alongside Erastes and the people he meets along the way, including Adelfi, a silent woman with mysterious magical abilities, and many others.


Fight the Empire, a brutal totalitarian regime that threatens the survival of the entire planet, and the DESTROYERS; machines designed by ancient architects with only the desire to wipe out humans, as Erastes uncovers the secrets behind not only his life and Esfal's, but of the entire world.

Features:
~Around 40 Hours of gameplay, along with a complete story that traverses the entire world.
~Traditional turn-based battles.
~Hidden treasures strewn in chests all around, can you find them all?
~Weapon material upgrading system.
~A living world, filled with NPC's and bustling with sites to explore.

==========

short_description: Join a wide group of characters as they travel across the world searching for answers, fighting a brutal autocracy, and chasing Esfal Psychi, a man of malevolent ambitions, in the first RPG title from uNIC Studios.
